Title: Halter Top Evening Dress with Side Cutouts

Category: evening, formal-gowns

Featured-image: KD019-red-halter-top-evening-dress-with-side-cutouts_p.jpg

----

Description: Backless gown with halter top is stunning and ready for any special occasion. The halter top is trimmed with rhinestones and extends into two straps along the back. The side cutouts lead to the backless style of this gown. The high split in the chiffon skirt completes this evening look.
